data:item.name: lpc802_io_expander
data:item.display_title: AN12126: Using LPC802 as an I2C I/O expander
data:item.overview: This application note introduces how to use LPC802 as I/O expander via the I2C-bus interface. Please refer to AN12126 for complete instructions on how to use this software. https://www.nxp.com/docs/en/application-note/AN12126.pdf
